Bernie Sanders , a liberal independent from Vermont, applauded Republicans for picking Paul Ryan , saying that unlike GOP leaders who have been vague about what programs they want to cut, Congressman Paul Ryan has been very clear. He added that Paul Ryan 's ideas on squeezing savings from Social Security, Medicare, Medicaid and other programs were "a very wrong approach to take."
